Nov. 23, 2013 D SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Fourth Section)
SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest (Fourth Section) 40 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Blaenavon) Contest sewbba-blaenavon-contest-fourth-section
Workmen's Hall, Blaenavon Kevin Moxon, soprano for Ebbw Valley Brass, had best instrumentalist.
League champions 2013 Ebbw Valley Brass League runner up Usk
Nov. 24, 2012, 6:29 p.m. Dec. 5, 2013, 3:36 p.m.
1 Ebbw Valley Brass Gareth Ritter Purcell Variations [Downie]
2 Newport Borough Band Robin Hackett Anglian Dances
3 Usk Brass Band Jeff Jones Partita [Gregson]
4 Cwmbran Band Jake Pritchard A Saddleworth Festival Overture
5 Vale of Glamorgan Band David Short Anglian Dances
